data.title: Find us on TV
data.meta_description: Find us on TV! The Know the Cause Television show is the most viewable health talk show in America. Check our website for a complete network listing.
data.text:
The Know The Cause television show airs in many zip codes across America. The show also airs on GOD TV & Christian Television Network (CTN) in addition to independent TV stations in Orlando, FL (TV 55), Tulsa, OK and more. Find a complete list below. Don’t forget that if you miss a day, you can always find the show right here on knowthecause.com. Thanks for watching and telling your friends about Know The Cause!

Television Network – CTN

DirecTV 376, Dish 262 & ROKU

https://www.ctnonline.com/schedules.html

GOD TV

DirecTV Channel 365, ROKU, Apple TV, Android TV/Google Play

https://www.god.tv/schedules/

getTV

Dish, Cabel, Antenna

https://www.get.tv/

BiNGe TV

Dish 218, Frontier, Fios, Sling, Charter, Cox, Streaming

https://ibinge.tv/

KDFI – More 27

Dallas, TX – 7:30am Central

Channel 27 & 27.1

https://www.fox4news.com/whatsonfox

KGEB Golden Eagle

Tulsa TV 53

https://kgeb.net

THE WALK

Several Affiliates, On-Line & ROKU

http://thewalk.tv/schedule/

SuperChannel – WACX TV

Orlando, FL

https://www.wacxtv.com/ProgramSchedule.aspx

Family Vision TV

Lafayette, LA – Lake Charles, LA – Crowley, LA KAJN – KFAM – JAGN

https://familyvisiontv.com/program-schedule/

Christian Family Network TV – CFNT

Wichita Falls, TX

https://www.cfnt.org

SAFE TV

On-Line & ROKU

http://safetv.org/schedule.html

KMCT TV 39
